constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. VELAZQUEZ:
H.R. 2949.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
The Congress shall have Power To regulate Commerce with
foreign Nations, and among the several States, and with the
Indian Tribes.
[Page H2136]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To amend section 1908 of title 41, United States Code, to exempt certain contracts from the periodic inflation adjustments to an acquisition-related dollar threshold.
